location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Dar-I-Khazineh, Key Plan of Property (To accompany M. R. on A. I. O. C. [Military Report on Anglo-Iranian Oil Company])'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 423 x 505mm, on sheet 453 x 553mm

mods.abstract: A plan of the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company's facilities at Dar-i-Khazineh, showing buildings, railways, and some topographical information. The plan includes an index which refers to the numbers given to buildings on the map. The plan was produced by the General Staff India and includes a printing statement which reads 'Survey Section No.1064 July 1940'. The plan is marked secret (copy no. 0007) and is Map No. 4 from the volume 'Military Report on the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company's (South Iranian) Oilfield Area'.
